mapper.select: SELECT id FROM customer WHERE addr_detail_id = #{addrDetailId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer (name, password, gender, phone, housing_estate_id) VALUE (#{c.name}, #{c.nickName}, #{c.password}, #{c.gender}, #{c.phone}, #{c.housingEstateId});

INSERT INTO collector (name, nick_name, company_name, password, IDCardNo, gender, phone, housing_estate_id) VALUE (#{c.name}, #{c.nickName}, #{c.companyName}, #{c.password}, #{c.IDCardNo}, #{c.gender}, #{c.phone}, #{c.housingEstateId})
INSERT INTO company (name, password, phone, area_id, addr_detail) VALUE (#{c.name}, #{c.password}, #{c.phone}, #{c.areaId}, #{c.addrDetail})
mapper.select: SELECT nick_name as name, password, phone, create_time FROM manager WHERE nick_name = #{nickName};
